text: aur (ai rasool sach to ye hai ki) ham agar unake paas pharishte bhee naazil karate aur unase murde bhee baaten karane lagate aur tamaam (makhafee(chhupee)) cheezen (jaise jannat va naar vagairah) agar vah giroh unake saamane la khade karate to bhee ye eemaan laane vaale na the magar jab allaah chaahe lekin unamen ke aksar nahin jaanate
